Reads mapping file. gets relevant data for idemp txt barcodes file.

# Setup

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
map <- read_delim("data_raw/map_for_compilation_OM14.txt", delim = "\t")

map
```


```{r}
map_idemp <- map %>% mutate(barcode = paste0(barcode_sequence, "N")) %>%  select(barcode, sample_id) %>% rename(sampleID = sample_id)

map_idemp
```
```{r}
map_idemp %>% write_delim("/Users/melo.d/Desktop/Research/Oman_fieldwork/Samail_16S_compilation_supporting_files/2014/barcode_demultiplex_short.txt", delim = "\t")
```
